[[Image:Episcopal shield.PNG|thumb|right|195px|The church [[Escutcheon (heraldry)|shield]] has nine [[Cross|cross-crosslets]] to represent the nine founding dioceses [http://www.heraldica.org/topics/usa/episcopa.htm] ]]
  â  
[[Episcopal Church (United States)|The Episcopal Church]] is governed by 100 [[diocese]]s in the [[United States]] proper, plus ten dioceses in other countries or outlying U.S. territories and the [[Convocation of American Churches in Europe]], which is similar to a diocese.
[[Episcopal Church (United States)|The Episcopal Church]] is governed by 100 [[diocese]]s in the [[United States]] proper, plus ten dioceses in other countries or outlying U.S. territories and the [[Convocation of American Churches in Europe]], which is similar to a diocese.
